âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Converts URLs to LLM-friendly input â€¢ Web search functionality with LLM-friendly output â€¢ Free, stable, and scalable API
ðŸ“– Summary: The 'Reader' repository provides a service to convert any URL into an LLM-friendly input, improving the performance of LLMs in tasks like RAG and agent systems. It offers both a URL-to-text conversion service and a web search service that returns the top 5 results in an LLM-friendly format. The service is provided via a free, stable, and scalable API.
